verbs.description: bedazzle (third-person singular simple present bedazzles, present participle bedazzling, simple past and past participle bedazzled)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To confuse or disarm by dazzling.
examples: He was bedazzled by her charm and wit.

entries.meaning: (transitive, informal) To decorate with sequins or other sparkly material; to bespangle.
